name: code-complexity-warning
prompt:
Before commit, analyze code complexity:

```
⚠️  CODE COMPLEXITY WARNING

High complexity detected in:

Function: [name]
File: [path]
Complexity: [score] (threshold: 10)

Issues:
• Too many conditional branches
• Deeply nested logic
• Hard to test and maintain

Recommendations:
1. Extract helper functions
2. Use early returns
3. Simplify conditionals
4. Consider strategy pattern

Refactor before committing? (yes/no)
```
